Unfortunately some of these episodes are interlaced. Wikipeda =  Interlacing performs poorly on moving images, leading to saw tooth or combing distortion 
Fine horizontal detail is subject to twice as much flicker as the rest of the picture. Season 2 dvdr has the same problem
